definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: The chilly winter is far away and the spring is coming on.
sentences.chinese: 蕭索寒冬漸已遠去，春天飄然而至。

sentences.english: The world looks bleak to those who are Overtired.
sentences.chinese: 過度疲累的人看到的世界是極度的蕭索與荒涼。

sentences.english: A serpentine plank path led to cloud-capped Sword Gate.
sentences.chinese: 棧道插雲彎彎曲曲上劍閣，風颳起黃塵格外蕭索。

sentences.english: It was just in the season of the late autumn, so there shows a gloomy and desolate scene even more.
sentences.chinese: 此刻是深秋時節，在這裏益發現出一片灰暗蕭索之象。

sentences.english: There was the solitary flat marsh on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 岸上是一片荒涼蕭索的沼地。

sentences.english: Monotonous in the winter, people always look forward to spring.
sentences.chinese: 在蕭索單調的冬季裏，人們總是在盼望着春天。
